## Maintenance Type
What type of maintenance is needed?
- [ ] Code cleanup
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Documentation updates
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Security update
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Other

## Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

## Rationale
Why is this maintenance needed? What benefits will it provide?

## Scope
What areas of the codebase will be affected?

## Checklist
- [ ] I have verified this maintenance task is necessary
- [ ] I have considered the impact on existing functionality
- [ ] I have checked for related issues

## Additional Notes
Add any other notes or context about the maintenance task.
